text:
Karena itu, Hanbin cukup kaget pas dapat kado seperti itu dari papa. Memek Hanbin pun ikut berkedut dan terasa gatal di bawah sana. Hanbin menyilangkan kaki supaya memeknya bisa ia gesekkan di antara pahanya. Berharap gatalnya berkurang tapi ternyata makin kedut dan malah mulai basah ia rasa.
"Hanbin suka nggak?" papa mengulang pertanyaannya sambil elus leher Hanbin dengan sensual. "Suka nggak kado dari papa?"
Hanbin menggeliatkan lehernya pada sentuhan papa di lehernya. "S-suka, pa..." Jawab Hanbin setengah melenguh.
"Dipake dong kalo suka."
Hanbin mengangguk dan beranjak berdiri, bermaksud berganti di kamar mandi. Tapi papa menahan tangannya. "Pake di sini aja."
Rona merah merekah di pipi Hanbin. "H-hanbin malu, pa." Cicitnya, tersipu.
trans:
Therefore, Hanbin was quite taken aback when he received such a gift from his father. Hanbin's pussy twitched and itched down there. Hanbin crossed his legs so he could rub his pussy between his thighs. He hoped the itch would lessen but instead the sensation intensified and he started to feel wet.
“Do you like it, Hanbin?” his father repeated the question while sensually stroking Hanbin's neck. “Do you like the gift from daddy?”
Hanbin wriggled his neck at the touch of his father’s hand. “I-I like it, daddy...” He replied half whimpering.
“Wear it if you like it.”
Hanbin nodded and stood up, intending to change in the bathroom. But daddy held his hand. "Just wear it here."
A flush of crimson spread across Hanbin's cheeks. "H-Hanbin is embarrassed, dad." He squeaked, blushing.
